title: Can we put league ranks in our summoner names ?
body: Is it ok if we can have like Bronze, Silver, etc ( Name here ) or is that not allowed i'm kind of curious ?

replies.body: I'm not sure what you mean!  If you mean the Boards, your profile should show your standing in the previous season's ranked.  You should also be able to see someone's current standing by mousing over a friend on your friend's list, or checking their profile in the client.  Let me know if that clears things up.
He means "Bronze Porocles" :P for his IGN.

Oh no, I'd be Wooden Porocles.  :P  This isn't currently a feature, but it's a neat idea.  I think having titles as part of your Summoner Name is a cool concept along with club tags.  I'm not part of the development team so I wouldn't know anything about that, though.  Since the updated client is still in testing, share your idea over at the [client discussion](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) boards and let your voice be heard.  Good luck!

Uh... Im pretty sure he means just putting a rank in your name.
Like does it violate the rules

Like Im silver, but can I put "Diamond I am Bird" or something like that without being punished. Not "_Silver_ Hello I am Bird"

Not titles but actual summoner name is what he was getting at.

Kinda how S2 Diana (for Season 2) could be referenced as Silver 2 Diana (obviously not) and other people that have ranks in their names.

BUT on the topic of TITLES I'll send a message to someone about something! I think you are on to something!

To answer it better,
I've seen people with things like that in your name. 
If you do the name change for it  and for whatever reason it's flagged they will assign you a temp one and you'll be able to change it.

It doesn't have to be your exact rank either.
I could put Challenger Piltover Customs (if it would fit, but it doesn't due to character limitations) and have that as my summoner name.
Not that i mean like name changes for example SilverYasuoMain, or Challenger something like that ? because i'm seeing a lot of ranked tiers in names on op.gg website.
